Blackknight smiled lightly, shaking his head. He touche his temple and 
sent a message to Talos.

Blackknight: Talos, I have found Phanna. (Closes the line) Now, 
Phanna, you don't need to cry now that I'm here!

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "hanakirei85" <HanaKirei85@a...> wrote:
> Phanna was scared, clitching her tiny Megatron stuffed toy with a 
rip 
> up the side of his leg in her arm that hadn't been damaged. Her 
wails 
> had died down and eventually died out, leaving her sniffing, lower 
> lip quivering. "I want my mama..." She hugged her plush friend 
> closer "You miss mama too Meggy?" She wiped an invisable tears off 
> the doll's button eyes "It okey...we gots ta be brave. I'll make 
sure 
> nothin will happen to us, me promise...dey'll find us both, an' den 
> we'll get all healed up. Me weally, weally pwomise..."
> 
> But...what of they were the only two left...? What if it was like 
one 
> of those shows where everyone dissapeared but her and Meggy?
> 
> <<He walks slowly towards the living quarters and activated his 
> scanner.
> 
> Blackknight: Anybody here?	>>
> 	
> Green optics brightening, she called out, standing up "Me hewe, me 
> hewe! You founds us!" She trotted fowards...and quickly tripped over 
> a piece of debris. Sitting up, her optics narrowed, took a deep 
> breath, and let out a 
> deafening "WAHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH!!!!!!"
> 
> ~Phanna, the young'un. ^_^; *couldn't think of anyting else to put*
